<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hallowed Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=3460) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 24</row>

**Archetype** [Hallowed Necromancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=172)

**Prerequisites**
[Hallowed Necromancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3459)

</column>

---

You've expanded your focus spellcasting to techniques used by clerics and wizards. You gain an additional focus spell, either the [necromancer school](/ArcaneSchools.aspx?ID=7) spell [_call of the grave_](/Spells.aspx?ID=522) or the initial domain spell of the [death domain](/Domains.aspx?ID=7), [_death's call_](/Spells.aspx?ID=413). Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

**Special** You can select this feat a second time, choosing the other initial focus spell.
name: Hallowed Initiate
